Uses of Class
org.sensorhub.api.sensor.SensorException

  • Packages that use SensorException 
    Package Description
    org.sensorhub.api.sensor  
    org.sensorhub.impl.sensor  

    • Uses of SensorException in org.sensorhub.api.sensor

      Methods in org.sensorhub.api.sensor that throw SensorException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CommandStatus ISensorControlInterface.cancelCommand(String commandID)
      Cancels a command before it is executed (for async or scheduled commands)
      int ISensorDataInterface.clearAllRecords()
      Clears all records currently stored in driver or sensor memory.
      This method must be implemented if ISensorDataInterface.isStorageSupported() returns true.
      CommandStatus ISensorControlInterface.execCommand(net.opengis.swe.v20.DataBlock command)
      Executes the command synchronously, blocking until completion of command
      CommandStatus ISensorControlInterface.execCommandGroup(List<net.opengis.swe.v20.DataBlock> commands)
      Executes multiple commands synchronously and in the order specified.
      Map<String,? extends ISensorDataInterface> ISensorModule.getAllOutputs()
      Retrieves the list of interfaces to all sensor data outputs
      List<net.opengis.swe.v20.DataBlock> ISensorDataInterface.getAllRecords(boolean clear)
      Retrieves all records stored by the driver or sensor.
      This method must be implemented if ISensorDataInterface.isStorageSupported() returns true.
      Map<String,? extends ISensorControlInterface> ISensorModule.getCommandInputs()
      Retrieves the list of interface to sensor command inputs
      CommandStatus ISensorControlInterface.getCommandStatus(String commandID)
      Retrieves command status
      List<CommandStatus> ISensorControlInterface.getCommandStatusHistory(String commandID)
      Gets complete status history for the specified command
      net.opengis.sensorml.v20.AbstractProcess ISensorModule.getCurrentSensorDescription()
      Retrieves most current sensor description
      net.opengis.swe.v20.DataBlock ISensorDataInterface.getLatestRecord()
      Gets the latest record received on this data channel.
      List<net.opengis.swe.v20.DataBlock> ISensorDataInterface.getLatestRecords(int maxRecords, boolean clear)
      Retrieves the N last records stored.
      This method must be implemented if ISensorDataInterface.isStorageSupported() returns true.
      int ISensorDataInterface.getNumberOfAvailableRecords()
      Retrieves number of record currectly available from driver or on-board sensor memory.
      This method must be implemented if ISensorDataInterface.isStorageSupported() returns true.
      Map<String,? extends ISensorDataInterface> ISensorModule.getObservationOutputs()
      Retrieves the list of interface to sensor observation outputs
      net.opengis.sensorml.v20.AbstractProcess ISensorModule.getSensorDescription(double time)
      Retrieves historic sensor description valid at time t
      List<net.opengis.sensorml.v20.AbstractProcess> ISensorModule.getSensorDescriptionHistory()
      Gets the whole history of sensor descriptions
      Map<String,? extends ISensorDataInterface> ISensorModule.getStatusOutputs()
      Retrieves the list of interface to sensor status outputs
      int ISensorDataInterface.getStorageCapacity()
      Gets the internal storage capacity.
      This method must be implemented if ISensorDataInterface.isStorageSupported() returns true.
      CommandStatus ISensorControlInterface.scheduleCommand(net.opengis.swe.v20.DataBlock command, org.vast.util.DateTime execTime)
      Schedules a command to be executed asynchronously at the specified time
      CommandStatus ISensorControlInterface.scheduleCommandGroup(List<net.opengis.swe.v20.DataBlock> commands, org.vast.util.DateTime execTime)
      Schedules a group of commands to be executed asynchronously at the specified time.
      CommandStatus ISensorControlInterface.sendCommand(net.opengis.swe.v20.DataBlock command)
      Sends a command that will be executed asynchronously
      CommandStatus ISensorControlInterface.sendCommandGroup(List<net.opengis.swe.v20.DataBlock> commands)
      Sends a group of commands for asynchronous execution.
      void ISensorModule.updateSensorDescription(net.opengis.sensorml.v20.AbstractProcess systemDesc, boolean recordHistory)
      Updates and historizes system description
